original_text: And the breadth of the door was ten cubits; and the sides of the door were five cubits on the one side, and five cubits on the other side: and he measured the length thereof, forty cubits: and the breadth, twenty cubits.
korean_text: 그 문 통로의 너비는 열 척이요 문 통로 이쪽 벽의 너비는 다섯 척이요 저쪽 벽의 너비는 다섯 척이며 그가 성소를 측량하니 그 길이는 마흔 척이요 그 너비는 스무 척이며

sentences.original_text: And the breadth of the door was ten cubits
and the sides of the door were five cubits on the one side
and five cubits on the other side
and he measured the length thereof, forty cubits
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그것의 길이를 재니 사십 규빗이었고
